topic: How to benchmark WASM targets using fastapi with Python 3.12+
prompt: Write a Python 3.12+ focused, accurate explainer for: How to benchmark WASM targets using fastapi with Python 3.12+

response_parsed.title: Benchmarking WebAssembly (WASM) Targets Using FastAPI with Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide demonstrates how to set up and use FastAPI for benchmarking WebAssembly (WASM) targets in Python 3.12+ projects.
key_points: Create a FastAPI application with WASM support
Write and optimize the WASM modules using PyWASMNN or other tools
Implement benchmarking functionality for measuring performance of your WASM targets
Execute the FastAPI server, test the endpoints and analyze the results

code_examples.code: // WASM module code (e.g., written using PyWASMNN or other tools)

version_notes: Python 3.12+ is required for this guide
FastAPI version 0.72.0 and above supports WebAssembly targets
caveats: Ensure that your WASM modules are optimized for performance
Some limitations may apply when benchmarking more complex WASM targets in FastAPI
